channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 苹果第四季度在中国智能手机出货量下降 2.1% - IDC
item.description: Apple's smartphone shipments in China shrank 2.1% in the final quarter of 2023 from the same period a year ago, but Apple rose to the number one spot in the market, data from research firm IDC showed on Thursday.翻译:研究公司 IDC 周四的数据显示，2023 年第四季度苹果在中国的智能手机出货量较去年同期下降 2.1%，但苹果上升至市场第一。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 日本商界领袖返回中国寻求加强合作
item.description: An unusually large delegation of about 200 Japanese business leaders arrived in China this week to bolster economic relations in the first such visit in more than four years and in the face of geopolitical headwinds that have strained bilateral ties.翻译:一个由约 200 名日本商界领袖组成的庞大代表团本周抵达中国，以加强经济关系，这是四年多来的首次此类访问，而且面临着令双边关系紧张的地缘政治逆风。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: Fortescue将与中国官员合作清理铁矿石运输
item.description: Australia's Fortescue Metals Group said on Thursday it will work with Chinese authorities to resolve a delay that has held up customs clearance of some iron ore cargoes at a port in the country's north.翻译:澳大利亚福蒂斯丘金属集团周四表示，将与中国当局合作解决导致该国北部港口部分铁矿石货物清关受阻的问题。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 特斯拉首席执行官马斯克：中国电动汽车公司将在没有贸易壁垒的情况下“摧毁”竞争对手
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on Wednesday Chinese automakers will "demolish" global rivals without trade barriers, underscoring the heat the U.S. electric vehicle market leader faces from the likes of BYD, who are racing to expand worldwide.翻译:特斯拉首席执行官埃隆·马斯克周三表示，中国汽车制造商将在没有贸易壁垒的情况下“摧毁”全球竞争对手，突显了这家美国电动汽车市场领导者面临着来自比亚迪等公司的压力，比亚迪等公司正在竞相向全球扩张。
item.author: Abhirup Roy

item.title: 台湾当选总统表示希望美国继续坚定支持
item.description: Taiwan president-elect Lai Ching-te said on Thursday he hopes that the United States can continue to firmly support Taiwan, as he met the first group of U.S. lawmakers to visit Taipei since he won an election earlier this month.翻译:台湾当选总统赖清德周四表示，他希望美国能够继续坚定支持台湾，因为他会见了自本月早些时候赢得选举以来第一批访问台北的美国议员。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 受股市打击，中国人涌入被禁比特币
item.description: More and more Chinese investors are using creative ways to own bitcoin and other crypto assets that they believe are safer than investing in crumbling stock and property markets at home.翻译:越来越多的中国投资者正在使用创造性的方式来拥有比特币和其他加密资产，他们认为这些资产比投资于摇摇欲坠的国内股票和房地产市场更安全。
item.author: Vidya Ranganathan, Summer Zhen

item.title: 中国股市反弹失去动力；焦点转向欧洲央行
item.description: Asian stocks traded cautiously and bonds fell on Thursday while investors waited on more detail of China's stimulus plans and for a European Central Bank meeting later in the session.翻译:亚洲股市周四交投谨慎，债券下跌，投资者等待中国刺激计划的更多细节以及欧洲央行稍后召开的会议。
item.author: Tom Westbrook

item.title: 美元在美国GDP之前稳定在六周高点附近；关注欧洲央行会议
item.description: The dollar was broadly steady near a six-week high on Thursday, as investors await GDP and other data this week to gauge where U.S. rates are headed, while the euro was soft ahead of the European Central Bank's policy meeting later in the day.翻译:周四美元基本稳定在六周高点附近，投资者等待本周的国内生产总值和其他数据来判断美国利率走向，而欧元在当天晚些时候欧洲央行政策会议之前表现疲软。
item.author: Ankur Banerjee

item.title: 美国原油库存大幅下降以及中国刺激计划的希望推动油价上涨
item.description: Oil prices rose on Thursday after data showed U.S. crude stockpiles fell more than expected last week, while the Chinese central bank's cut in banks' reserve ratio reinforced hopes of more stimulus measures and economic recovery.翻译:数据显示上周美国原油库存降幅超过预期，而中国央行下调银行准备金率增强了对更多刺激措施和经济复苏的希望，油价周四上涨。
item.author: Yuka Obayashi

item.title: 中国军方称美国驱逐舰在台海“炒作”通过
item.description: China's military said it organized troops to follow and monitor a U.S. destroyer that transited through the Taiwan Strait on Wednesday, according to a statement.翻译:一份声明称，中国军方表示，已组织部队对周三通过台湾海峡的一艘美国驱逐舰进行跟踪监视。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：中国乐观情绪蔓延，韩国GDP成为焦点
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 波音737 MAX返回中国
item.description: Boeing was set to deliver its first 737 MAX to a Chinese airline since March 2019 on Wednesday, flight data shows, ending a four-year freeze for the U.S. planemaker's most profitable jet.翻译:飞行数据显示，波音将于周三向一家中国航空公司交付自 2019 年 3 月以来的首架 737 MAX，结束这家美国飞机制造商最赚钱的喷气式飞机四年来的冻结。
item.author: Valerie Insinna

item.title: 郑的目标是让德约科维奇在半决赛中“冷静”
item.description: Zheng Qinwen reached the semi-finals of the Australian Open for the first time with her win over Anna Kalinskaya on Wednesday, and now the Chinese 12th seed wants to learn to be as chilled as men's world number one Novak Djokovic.翻译:周三，郑沁文战胜安娜·卡林斯卡娅，首次进入澳大利亚网球公开赛半决赛，现在这位中国12号种子想要学习像男子世界排名第一的诺瓦克·德约科维奇那样冷静。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：欧盟立法者表示，欧洲将于下周就供应链紧急权力达成一致
item.description: EU countries and lawmakers are expected to agree on rules next week which would force Europe-based companies to prioritise production of key products to prevent a supply chain crisis, a key lawmaker in charge of the legislation said on Wednesday.翻译:负责该立法的一位主要立法者周三表示，预计欧盟国家和立法者将在下周就规则达成一致，这将迫使欧洲公司优先生产关键产品，以防止供应链危机。
item.author: Foo Yun Chee

item.title: FAA 禁止波音增加 MAX 产量，但结束部分停飞
item.description: The U.S. Federal Aviation Administration late on Wednesday tightened pressure on Boeing by barring the troubled planemaker from expanding production of its best-selling 737 MAX narrowbody planes, following "unacceptable" quality issues.翻译:由于出现“不可接受的”质量问题，美国联邦航空管理局周三晚间加大了对波音公司的压力，禁止这家陷入困境的飞机制造商扩大其最畅销的 737 MAX 窄体飞机的生产。
item.author: David Shepardson, Valerie Insinna, Tim Hepher

item.title: 委员会在加拿大外国干涉调查中寻求有关印度的信息
item.description: An independent commission probing alleged foreign interference in Canada asked the Trudeau government on Wednesday to share information about possible meddling in elections by India, a development that could aggravate already-tense Ottawa-New Delhi relations.翻译:一个调查加拿大涉嫌外国干涉的独立委员会周三要求特鲁多政府分享有关印度可能干预选举的信息，这一事态发展可能会加剧渥太华与新德里之间本已紧张的关系。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国大选后派出第一艘军舰通过台湾海峡
item.description: The U.S. Navy said the destroyer USS John Finn transited through a corridor in the Taiwan Strait that was "beyond the territorial sea of any coastal state".翻译:美国海军表示，约翰·芬恩号驱逐舰穿过台湾海峡的一条走廊，该走廊“超出任何沿海国家的领海”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国江西省商店火灾造成39人死亡、多人被困
item.description: A fire at a street shop in Xinyu City of Jiangxi Province has killed 39 people and injured nine, Chinese state media and the local government said on Wednesday, adding that some people were still trapped.翻译:中国官方媒体和当地政府周三表示，江西省新余市一家街边商店发生火灾，已造成 39 人死亡、9 人受伤，并补充说仍有一些人被困。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国与乌兹别克斯坦建立更紧密的联系，推动铁路路线绕过俄罗斯
item.description: China on Wednesday upgraded its diplomatic ties with Uzbekistan and offered closer cooperation across a range of projects, including a Central Asia railway that would open up a new trade route as shippers shun an existing overland link via Russia.翻译:中国周三升级了与乌兹别克斯坦的外交关系，并在一系列项目上提供了更密切的合作，其中包括一条中亚铁路，该铁路将开辟一条新的贸易路线，因为托运人将避开经由俄罗斯的现有陆路连接。
item.author: Liz Lee, Ryan Woo

item.title: 锡因过剩而受到束缚，但绿色工业需求有望消除供应
item.description: The potential for a build-up of tin supplies this year is likely to put pressure on prices, but accelerating demand from the energy transition sector, including solar panels and electric vehicles, should support prices in the future.翻译:今年锡供应量增加的可能性可能会给价格带来压力，但太阳能电池板和电动汽车等能源转型行业需求的加速增长应该会支撑未来的价格。
item.author: Pratima Desai
